inn1.comm: Wallop! What a start by this exciting batsman. Short and a tad wide, bang. He rocked back to crash it over backward point, Karthik flew to his left but couldn't reach it
And Nehra tries to get this straighter but ends up bowling down leg ... Pressure
goes for the cut again but mistimes it .. he was slightly early into the shot and perhaps, went too hard at it
pushes it wide outside off stump ... well past the wide line ...
Loverly straight drive! Dilshan leans forward to drive the full delivery past the umpire...
And the Dilshan pressure is showing on Nehra. He slips yet another wide, this time down the leg side.
good delivery , his first one this game, bouncing from short of length and straightening on middle stump line, Dilshan tries to force it off the back foot and edges it past the stumps
just outside off stump, punched away to backward point
full and hint of in swing, Dilshan falls over a bit while trying to flick it and is hit on the pad. Going down leg, though
outside off stump, Jayasuriya gets forward to push it cautiously to the bowler ... the bat was well away from the body as he reached out for the ball
full and around the off stump, driven to mid-on
slightly short and Jayasuriya goes for the cut but ends up mistiming it

ooh tight single there  .. risky ... Jayasuriya pushed to mid-off and called Dilshan for a run. Ishant had a shy at the non-striker's end bu missed it .. had he hit .. it would have been interesting. And what's more there are some overthrows ..
bouncing outside off stump, run down to third man for a single
Whack! Jayasuriya is up and running with a typical flashy airy drive over covers. He got on that front foot and lifted the length delivery up and over the infield.
leans forward to push the length delivery to mid-off
back of length outside off stump, angling away, Dilshan stays adjacent to the line, waits before flashing it down to third man
tries the bouncer, well-directed one at that, Jayasuriya helps it down to deep backward square-leg
full pitched around the off stump, Dilshan needs no further invitation to go for a big drive and he does but can't beat Yuvraj at mid-off
on the pads, tucked to deep square-leg region where RP mops up. Free hit coming up. Immense fun awaits.
length delivery down the leg side, Dilshan tries to swing it away, misses.
clears the front foot and has a big swing across the line but edges it to his pad
Smashed away! Short and wide, flayed away to the point boundary. As they would say in the Caribbean, 'Not a man move'
Fabulous straight drive. Classy. He just leaned into it and caressed it - no violence this time - past the umpire
slightly short, pulled away for a single
on the stumps, defended to the on side
short in length, cut away to point
fuller, outside off, Dilshan goes for one almighty swing but edges it to the on side.
full in length on the off stump line, pushed to covers
short in length, outside off stump, cut away to backward point
in the zone outside off stump, Jayasuriya goes for the cut but doesn't connect
good delivery .. full in length and moving away from the off stump, Jayasuriya stabbed it off the outer edge and well clear of the first slip
short in length, on the off and middle, tucked to midwicket
slips in a slower one, full, around the off stump, pushed to left of Harbhajan Singh at mid-off for a single
leans forward to deflect it to the right of mid-on for a single
RP switches to round the stumps, hurls a length delivery on the off stump line, pushed to the off side for a single
short mid-off in place ... short in length delivery on the pads, tries to pull but doesn't connect properly
leans forward to drive it back to the bowler
just outside the off stump, slashed away to third man
leans forward to push a back-of-length delivery to short mid-off
shuffles across to clip the ball to square-leg region for a single
in the corridor outside off, cut down to backward point
length delivery just outside off, nudged away to the off side
drops it short, Jayasuriya goes for the pull but edges it to the on side
short in length on the middle and leg, pulled to deep square-leg region and by the time Nehra ambles after it they run hard to come back for three runs
Biff!  Ishant fires in a bouncer and Dilshan gets into the position and pulls it to the fine-leg region.
full in length just outside off stump, Dilshan is beaten, pushing inside the line
short delivery, Jayasuriya can't connect with the pull shot
ah! It was a short delivery outside off stump, Jayasuriya waited for it to arrive before swatting it over midwicket for yet another boundary.
on the pads, tucked away to deep backward square-leg
short in length, cut away to point
RP stays round the stumps, fires it in full and moving towards the pad, Dilshan tries to whip it away, misses and is struck on the pad
just outside off stump, from back of length, punched to short cover
stands tall to chop down a short-of-length delivery to point
fuller in length outside off, Jayasuriya is late in getting forward, lunges out to have a big crack at it but edges it past the leg stump
pushes the length delivery towards mid-off and he rushes across for a quick single
it lands short of length and holds its line outside off stump, Dilshan tries to punch it on the up through the off side but gets a fat edge which is swallowed by Dhoni
fullish, on the middle and off line, pushed to mid-on
129 kmph bouncer and Mahela ducks under
full in length outside off stump, Jayasuriya lifts it just over Nehra at mid-off
on the middle and leg, short in length, clipped past square-leg
Whoa! what a lovely pull. Jayasuriya pressed back after he saw the length and lifted it effortlessly over midwicket
RP goes for another bouncer, this time higher, left alone
high bouncer outside off .. correctly called a wide
full in length, moves across to drive to covers
Bosh! Another short delivery and Jayasuriya swings it over midwicket. Again. Gem of an innings so far.
oh gorgeous square drive from Mahela. He leaned across to caress it through point
Ishant pushes it further outside off and Mahela reaches out to jab it off the outer edge past the lone slip .. Mahela took the bottom-hand off the handle at the last minute there
similar delivery, Mahela gets across, shapes to play before withdrawing his bat away
high bouncer outside off, left alone
short in length, moving in towards off stump, defended on the front foot
gets forward to defend it to covers
leans forward to defend to the off side
just outside off, slightly short in length, cut away to backward point
presses across to turn the ball from middle to backward square-leg
leans forward to turn it to midwicket
stretches forward to drive to long-on
comes in with the arm, from round the stumps, cut down to backward point
just outside off stump, defended to covers
around the off stump, straightening, Mahela adjusts by opening the bat-face to push it to the point region
bangs in a high bouncer outside off stump ... too high
short and wide, Mahela frees his arms and gets a nice fat edge high over slip and down to the third-man boundary
leans forward to push to covers
short and outside off, chopped down to third man
lifting delivery, swatted to midwicket
flighted slowly through the air, on the off and middle, driven towards the non-striker and Harbhajan intercepts
quicker but slips it down the leg side
slower, turning into middle and leg line, nudged to the on side
shuffles across, leans over to flick from the off stump to backward square-leg
goes down on his knee to sweep a delivery from the off stump to deep backward square-leg
from round the stumps, turned wide of midwicket
leans forward to on drive the flighted delivery to long-on
low dipping full toss, driven to long-on
on the middle stump line, deflected past square-leg
slightly short in length, cut to backward point
on the middle and leg, worked towards deep backward square-leg and they will get two

lands on the leg and middle line and spins down past the attempted flick. Mahela loses his balance, drags his back foot on to the line and then while dragging it back inside the crease, he actually lifts it in the air. The bails come off as the foot comes down. Close call. Too close to give. or is it? The third umpire has given it out! Good work from Dhoni, though. And it should have called a wide, irrespective of the stumping.
full and down the leg side, now Sanga misses the glance and DHoni breaks the stumps but Sanga is inside the crease. This time its been called a wide
flicks this on past square-leg
outside off, pushed to backward point
leans forward to defend back to the bowler
flighted full outside off stump, driven to cover
leans forward to defend a flighted delivery
goes right back and across to clip it to wide midwicket
leans forward to flick it to deep square-leg region
on the leg side, swept to short fine-leg
goes right back to work it to deep midwicket
on the middle and off line, pushed out to the off side
on the off stump line, squeezed out to covers
full, really full on the middle, tapped past square-leg and by the time the fielders move in from the deep, they turn back for the second. The grand old man of International cricket is one fit guy
flighted on the off stump line, defended back down the pitch
leans forward to push the off break to cover
skips down the track and pushes it back to the bowler

Dharmasena has given him lbw and Sanga storms off in real anger there. It looks pretty straight actually, unless there was an inside edge which the replays don't reveal. It landed on a length around the middle, Sangakkara came forward to defend but opened his bat-face and ended up pushing just outside the line. The ball squeezed past the bat and turned a little to hit him in front of the middle It flicked the inner half of the front pad before hitting the back pad. Let's wait for the snickometer to see if there was any edge
leans forward to defend to the on side
leans forward to turn the ball to midwicket
low full toss on the leg and middle, pushed softly to left of midwicket for a single. Jayasuriya seems intent on staying for a big knock there
dipping flighted delivery, worked to midwicket
just outside the off stump, squeezed to point region
tossed up full, driven to long-off
leans forward to work it to square-leg
His 68th ODI fifty. 14th against India. First after 8 ODIS. It was slightly short, cut to deep point
flatter, just outside off stump, defended to the on side
skips down the track and deflects it to midwicket where Yuvraj fumbles to give away a run
flighted full outside off, turned wide of midwicket
gets forward to ease the flighted delivery to long-off
on the off stump line turned behind square-leg
on the middle, skidding on , punched away to long-on
leans forward to drive to long-off
quicker one, on the off and middle, pushed back to the bowler
drops it short and Jayasuriya goes for the pull ,doesn't quite time it well but gets it over Karthik who was a few yards in from the deep midwicket boundary
Bang! Another one slightly short and Jayasuriya pulls it wide of deep midwicket to pick up yet another boundary.
gets forward to push it to long-off
reaches forward to work it to midwicket
flighted full, on driven to long-on
flighted delivery dipping on the middle, eased down to long-on
low full toss just outside off, worked to midwicket
flatter, turns in a bit, edges the push to the pad
on the middle and leg, turned to short fine-leg
floated outside leg, swept to fine-leg for a single
on the middle and leg, dabbed to the on side
just outside off stump, cut down to deep backward point
on the middle and leg, turned to right of midwicket
floated full outside off, driven wide of long-off where Ishant cleans up
full and down the leg side
goes back to punch it to long-on
on the middle, nudged to the on side
on the leg and middle, worked to deep midwicket
flighted on the off stump line, nurdled to the on side for a single
Top shot! it was flighted around the off stump, Jayasuriya stayed adjacent to the line and lifted it superbly inside-out to wide long-off boundary
And now plays a sweep to retain the strike

fetches it from almost outside off and pushes it towards long-on and Jayasuriya turns back for the second run. DK throws at the striker;s end, slightly wide, and Dhoni doesn't collect it cleanly. Jayasuriya gets home
outside leg stump, swept to short fine-leg
gets forward to work it to vacant space at midwicket and Yuvraj rushes after it
on the middle and off line, turned past square-leg
stays back to punch it to long-off
leans forward to drive it to long-on
starts with a slowish delivery, 123k, overpitched too, easy single to long-off ensues
angled down the leg side, lucky for Nehra that it flicked the thigh pad on the way
smart shot, poor bowling, short, into the body with the fine leg very square, Jaya, ever so aware, flicks his wrists on it, nudging it fine of Ishant
short, and pulled in front of square this time, gets two to wide of long-on
full, on the pads, and he plays a little pick-up, which lands between deep square and deep fine
pitched up, angling across Mathews who gets on the front foot and defends it to cover
sloppy RP in the field, this is swept powerfully, almost a sledgehammer, and RP at deep backward square is beaten by the spin off the second bounce
looks for the reverse, can't beat short third
outside leg, and this time he has paddled it fine, goes too fast for Dravid at short fine - Jaya is opening up - again
floated up outside leg again, much slower this time, which means Jaya doesn't get enough into the fine paddle
flighted outside off, flicked to midwicket
stays on the pads, nudge to square of short fine, and the 40-year-old Jaya wants a second - much younger Mathews rightfully calls "no"
Thwack! short delivery, pulled hard but straight to deep square-leg
leans forward to defend to the off side
Crash! Nehra hurls across a bouncer on the off stump line, Angelo thrashes it to wide midwicket boundary
slower one, full, pushed to cover
length delivery around off stump, defended on the front foot

edged fullish and outside off, Angelo edges the off drive and Dhoni lunged to his right to take it. DHoni is not sure whether he had taken it cleanly and so, the umpires refer it upstairs. It looks as it touches the ground. Not out is the right verdict.
leans forward to defend to covers
just outside off stump, cut down to right of deep point
leans forward to work it through midwicket
moves to 98 with a tap past the bowler.
on the middle, turned to midwicket
reaches forward to play a delicate paddle sweep to fine-leg region

oh he misses out on the hundred. The former team-mate Dharmasena raises the fatal finger. Tight call.  It cut in from outside off stump, Jayasuriya tries to work it across the line and it struck him around the off stump. TV Hawk eye says impact was inside .. well 80 % of the ball was outside but just a tiny wedge was inside the line. So, technically that's out I guess .. What an innings, though. Whaddaplayaa. Good decision from Dharmasena, says Bishop
bangs in the bouncer, defended to the on side
runs it down to third man
short in length around the off stump, worked wide of midwicket
yorker on the middle, defended to midwicket
just outside off stump, dabs it off the bottom edge to backward point
on the middle and leg, turned to short fine-leg
mistimes the drive back to the bowler
just outside off stump, spins in a bit, clipped through the on side
on the middle and leg, driven to wide long-on
stumped! He charges down the track, tries to work the off break across the line but misses it completely. Dhoni does the rest.
leans forward to defend to the off side
turns from outside leg, dabbed to the on side
turn and bounce there , it spun from outside leg, the batsman is squared-up but adjusts to steer it to the off side
flighted outside off, spins in sharply to go through the bat and pad gap
waits for it to turn to work it  to square-leg
gets forward to drive through the off side
tossed up, on driven to long-on
turns in from the off stump line, worked to wide midwicket region
drifts in from round the stumps on the leg side, nudged to short fine-leg
leans across to wrist the ball from almost outside off to square-leg
just short in length, punched to cover
skids on just outside off stump, cut away superbly to deep point boundary. He took it from the off stump and found the gap perfectly. there was a man in the deep but he couldn't get across in time
leans forward to on drive to long-on
on the leg side, flicked to fine-leg
moves down the track and drives to long-off
on the middle stump line, pushed to the bowler
floated across, turned to midwicket
flicked past square-leg for a single
outside the off stump. Pushes it to square point and runs across for a quick single
on the leg stump. Kandamby effortlessly works it away to vacant deep midwicket for three runs
outside the off stump and moving away. Kapugedera drives it off the front foot to deep point for a single
short ball on the middle stump. Kandamby ducks under or rather crouches under it easily
on the leg stump. On the ribs. Kandamby waits for a fraction more than usual and turns it behind square for a single
outside the off stump. Kapugedera pushes it to the cover area
full and well outside the off stump, driven through the covers
on a length, straightening on the off and middle line, jabs it away to the off side
length delivery on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
full pitched around off stump, driven to long-off. 200 up for SL.
bouncer outside off stump, Kandamby opens the bat-face and runs it through the vacant slip region for a four!
length delivery on the off and middle, defended away
on a length around off stump, defended away
leans forward to push it to the off side
short and wide, slapped to Dravid at sweeper cover
length delivery angling away, Kandamby goes back and across to steer it to backward point
fullish ,. on the off and middle, turned through midwicket
short delivery, fended away to the on side, slightly wide of midwicket,  for a quick single
length delivery , pushed back down the pitch and RP flings a throw past the batsman and has a huge smile as the crowd roar their disapproval!
gets behind the line to turn it to the on side
moving in towards off and middle, full in length, tapped straight to midwicket
just outside off stump, full in length but Kandamby hangs back, bends his back knee to place the ball to wide third man
leans forward to drive the full delivery to long-off
turns into middle stump, deflected wide of short fine-leg for a single
from round the stumps, skids on straight outside off, chopped to point
slips just  down the leg side, misses the paddle sweep ....
taps this past square-leg for a single
lands outside leg and spins down for a wide
leans forward to work it to backward square-leg
from round the stumps, a straighter one, skids on, pushed away to the off side
short in length, punched to cover
on the middle stump line, wristed to right of Tendulkar at mid-on
gets forward to push-drive wide of Tendulkar at mid-off for a single
short in length, just outside off stump, fisted to long-off
around the off stump, steered to cover point for a quick single
full in length outside off stump, driven to long-off
sweeps it from outside off to deep square-leg for couple more runs.
aha! the reverse sweep is out now and he has connected it superbly. He pressed forward and reverse swept it past backward point. Neatly done.
from round the stumps, topspinner on middle, defended down the pitch
turns in to the middle, stabbed away to the off side and Dhoni moves to pick it up
slightly short, goes back to tuck it to deep backward square-leg
flighted on the legs, turned to Tendulkar at deep square-leg
low dipping full toss on the legs, flicked away for couple of runs
backs away to punch it to cover
outside leg stump, dabbed past square-leg
drags it short and Kapu pulls it to deep midwicket
moves well outside leg, Pathan follows him but he gets even outside the line and lifts it to wide long-off boundary! Awesome shot. Very skillful.
leans forward to flick it past square-leg
flatter on the middle, clipped to the on side for a single
Harbhajan goes round the stumps, flights it full outside off, worked wide of midwicket
flighted on the leg stump line, full, tries to flick, misses and is hit on the pad
just outside off stump, punched to cover
shorter, quicker, dabbed to point
just outside off stump, skids on straight, defended back to Harbhajan
fullish delivery on the off, he leans forward to wrist it to fine-leg boundary. IT was the slower one, he reached out and worked his wrists over time
short in length, flashed to backward point
just outside off stump, leans back to cut it to third man
just outside the off stump, short in length, Kandamby has big swing across the line and misses it. Kapu walks over for a chat
low full toss, pushed wide of  midwicket for two runs. RP Singh throws to Dhoni who breaks the stumps but Kandamby is home. It was referred to third umpire
retains the strike with a dab
just outside the off stump, moving away, run down to third man
moving into Kapugedera who taps it to midwicket for a single . 250 up.
slower one, fullish, turned to the on side for a quick single
short in length, on the middle and leg, clipped to long leg
on the middle and leg, dabbed to Nehra at midwicket who fires a direct hit at the non-striker's end
full pitched on the middle and off, driven past the non-striker and to left of long-off
fullish, outside off stump, driven to left of cover for a single
low full toss on the middle, swung to deep midwicket
charges down the track for a big swing but is beaten by the slower one
low full toss, driven down to long-off
clears the front foot, has a big slog across but doesn't connect well .. and is struck in front of middle .. given as leg bye .. hmmm
wafted the on side for a single
yorker length on the off, dug out towards cover where RP swoops on the ball and fires in a direct hit at the non-striker's end. Gone.
short in length, outside off stump, dabbed down to third man
yorker length on the leg stump, turned past square leg for a single
moves outside leg, Ishant follows him with a bouncer and Kandamby top edges his pull over the keeper. What's more that's his fifty.
Top shot! Really full delivery outside off, short of the yorker length, Kandam by had moved outside leg stump, reached out to time it sweetly past backward point
full delivery outside off, opens the bat-face to run it down to third man
fullish delivery on the off stump line, pushed to the off side where TEndulkar fumbles to give an extra run
drags it off the inner half of the bat to midwicket
short delivery on the off stump, swatted past square-leg
Kandamby is having a ball. He takes couple of steps down the track and swings the low dipping full toss to midwicket boundary
short of length delivery outside off, flat batted to long-on
walks down the track, tries to swing the slower one to midwicket but fails to connect
Fab paddle scoop! He walked across the sticks, waited for the slower one to arrive before scooping it over short fine-leg from well outside off stump!
driven down to long-on for a single
low dipping full toss, turned to midwicket
Cracked away! It was full and well outside off, Kandamby reached out to slash it over covers. Bang.
Dropped by Nehra. Kandamby had mishit the lofted shot towards mid-on and Nehra ran across from midwicket, got under the ball but dropped the sitter
moves outside leg, crouches to chop the full delivery to third man
Thwack! He moves outside leg again, Ishant slips in a slower one full outside the leg stump which has been lifted to the extra-cover boundary.
More violence. 300 up. What an knock this has been. Kandamby slams this full delivery to left of mid-off. Whoosh!
moves well outside leg stump, Ishant hurls it yorker length outside off, Kandamby can't reach; he had moved too far outside leg
on the leg stump line, tucked toward deep square-leg for two runs
Kandambeeeee! He moved inside the line to wrist the short of length delivery on the leg stump well clear of the short fine-leg fielder
yorker length outside off, dug out past point for a single

inn2.comm: shout for lbw as Karthik, who is standing outside the crease, tries to flick across the line and is struck on the pad. Going down leg...
leans forward to defend to the off side
just outside off, holding its line this time, pushed back to the bowler
swings in but slips down the leg side past Karthik and past the diving Sangakkara
straightens outside off stump from short of length, steered to third man
just outside off stump, back of length, punched sweetly through covers
moving in to the off stump, presents the full bat-face in defense
banged in short and outside off stump, Karthik flashes it high over point
fuller, on a length, straighter on the middle and off, defended down the track
short and angling away, lashed in the air to right of third man for a single
slips it full and just outside leg stump, Tendulkar waits for it to arrive before glancing it away to the boundary. Tendulkar has a chat with karthik while Sanga rushes across to talk to his bowler
gets behind the line to defend a length delivery
on the pads, clipped straight to midwicket. That was timed well but he couldn't pierce the gap
gets forward to work the length delivery to midwicket
Bang. It was short in length and outside off stump, Karthik pulls it wide of long-on to pick up another boundary.
back of length, holding its line outside off, punched down to cover
nice ... slips in a yorker on the middle, Karthik gets the front foot out of the way and brings the bat down in a hurry to keep the ball out
gets forward to defend and edges it to the on side for a single
length delivery outside off stump, Tendulkar stays back to punch it to cover
full in length, driven well back to the bowler who deflects it to mid-off
on the middle stump line, leans forward to tap it to the off side
moves forward to ease it wide of mid-on for a single

run out missed of Sachin. It was pushed towards extra cover and Sachin called his partner for a quick single. Kapugedera rushed across, picked the ball and flicked the throw as he dived forward but couldn't hit the stumps.
off cutter outside off stump, Karthik waits before guiding it to third man
just outside off stump, tapped close on the off side, thinks about a single but two fielders converge on the ball. A smiling Sachin walks across to have a chat.
slower one, on the off stump line, worked wide of midwicket for a single
goes back, stands tall to punch the back-of-length delivery back to the bowler

on the middle and leg, short in length, Tendulkar goes back and across to wrist it superbly to deep backward square-leg boundary. He made sure he got the ball well to the right of the deep square-leg fielder, who has now moved a bit finer
129.5 kmph full delivery on the off and middle, Tendulkar lunged out to off drive and edged it between his legs
again he edges the off drive, this time back to the bowler .. the weight transfer is not happening right for him in the last two deliveries
full delivery on the off and middle, Karthik goes hard into the drive and edges it to the pad
slower one around off stump, Karthik glided forward, opened the bat-face and timed it well through cover point
full in length, around the off stump, driven well but Mahela cuts it off neatly at short extra cover
Thushara strikes. It was the short delivery at the rib cage, Karhik is late on the pull and gloves it down the leg side, well caught by Sangakkara. Enter Rahul Dravid.
length delivery angling away from Dravid who stretches his front foot well across to defend
on the middle and leg, whipped to deep backward square-leg
gets forward to push the back-of-length delivery to left of the bowler

beaten outside off stump ... full and moving in from outside off, Dravid went for the big on-the-up drive but missed it and the ball threaded the bat and pad gap and moved past the off stump and tailed away late
gets behind the line to defend to the bowler
slower, on the off stump, Tendulkar adjusts to push it to the off side
short in length, around the off stump, Tendulkar gets on the back foot, crouches and punches it to point
fuller, homing in on the off stump, draws Tendulkar forward and its pushed away to cover
Dilshan flies at backward point to make a fine stop. Dravid had cracked the cut to the left of Dilshan who makes a brilliant stop
banged in short, swatted away to square-leg
short in length, bouncing across Tendulkar who pushes it to covers
the slower one, full and just outside leg stump, Tendulkar wrists it to deep square-leg region
short in length, on the middle and leg, clipped to long leg for a single
fullish, on the middle , trying for the lbw but Dravid holds his balance while leaning forward and on drives it wide of mid-on
full in length outside off stump, checks his push-drive and the ball rolls to covers
just outside off stump, keeps a touch low, Dravid tries to run it down to third man, misses and the ball bounces once before it reaches Sanga
fuller, on the off and middle, Dravid goes for the on drive and makes contact with the inner half of the bat and the ball rolls to left of midwicket
a slower one outside off, Tendulkar reaches out to go for the big drive through covers but is beaten by the lack of pace
another slower one, around 116 kmph length delivery outside off, Tendulkar reaches out to lift it high over extra-cover ..
short in length, moving in, turned to midwicket
slower one, fullish, pushed past the bowler
another slower one, off cutter just outside off, Dravid has to adjust and he does to defend it to point
bangs it in short outside off, Dravid mistimes the pull but finds the gap between midwicket and mid-on

on the middle, deflected to square-leg for a single. There is a direct hit from Angelo at the non-striker's end. They go upstairs but Dravid was just in. He should have made it much more comfortably but he was a touch lazy (if that's the word to use) in getting the bat down and inside the crease
lovely whip through square-leg. It was a length delivery on the middle and leg, Tendulkar wrists it past square-leg fielder
slower one, on the middle stump line, Tendulkar adjusts to roll his wrists over the ball and defend it to the on side
on the middle and off line, turned to midwicket
on the off stump line, dead -on accurate with the line and length, pushed away towards mid-on
slower one, full, Dravid is early into the forcing drive and hits it uppishly but short of mid-on

hurls across a bouncer on the off and middle line, Dravid shapes to pull before withdrawing his bat away from the line as it climbed over him... wide called for the height and Sanga is not too pleased.
leans forward to flick it past square-leg for a single
yet another slower one from Kula but he slips it down the leg side and all Tendulkar needed to do  was to get bat on ball and he glances it to the boundary
short in length, around the off stump, Tendulkar wants to punch on the up but mistimes it. He has a close look at where the ball made contact with the bat.
138.3 kmph length delivery to start off the proceeding, Dravid opens the bat-face to guide it down to backward point
just outside off, Dravid comes forward and steers it on the bounce to backward point
lovely slower one, catches Dravid by surprise and it bounces high as well and Dravid drops his wrists and gets the bat out of the way of the off cutter
another slower one, on the off and middle, tickled to square-leg ... vacant spaces on the leg side and it allows Dravid to come back for a comfortable two
137.4 lifting delivery bouncing over Dravid who went for the pull but it climbed over him ..
140.2 short of length delivery outside off, Dravid goes for the cut but the ball bounces over the blade
the slower ones keep coming from Sri Lanka. Tendulkar crouches to play it but it moves past the outside edge and bounces once before it reaches Sanga
length delivery on the off stump line, punched on the up, the ball was briefly in the air but drops well short of mid-off
aha! another slower one, Tendulkar tries to run it down to third man but no wood on leather. Sangakkara collects.
full in length, on the off stump, Tendulkar stays back and mistimes his drive to the off side
short in length, on the off stump, stays adjacent to the line, tries to create room but punches straight to cover
pushes it towards mid-on for a single
on the pads, Tendulkar, Malinga's IPL team-mate, shuffles across to dab it to the on side and it rolls down to fine-leg region

the slow off cutter, full, Dravid is early into his on drive, checks his shot and desperately rolls his wrists to try to keep the ball down and it's in the air but for a brief while and falls short of midwicket
Another slower one, a dipping full toss and Dravid picks this one and whips it through the right of mid-on
a fast yorker outside off, dug out to backward point, thinks about a single before killing his thought as Dilshan rushes in
ooh .. almost 144 kmph fast delivery bursting through the corridor, Dravid has a poke and a miss
another fast one, bouncing to hit Dravid high on the bat...

Done in by the slower one. They have been bowling quite a few and Kula has struck with this off cutter. Tendulkar punched it straight to Mendis at mid-on and even as he hit it, he knew he was a goner....
bouncing outside off stump, steered to right of backward point where Dilshan makes a diving stop. The crowd roar.
chest-high bouncer, Yuvraj doesn't look too comfortable but manages to fend it down to the off side
Yuvraj walks down the track and is served a full toss which he smashes to long-on boundary. Smack!
Try beating that man Dilshan. Crowd roar their approval as Dilshan dives to his right to cut off a single
slower one, outside off, short in length, punched to left of mid-off for a single
145.3 fast delivery but wide outside off stump
another one well outside off, Yuvraj chases it and is beaten on the poke
short in length, on the off stump line, defended to the off side
edged past the lone slip. It was again pushed across outside off, making Yuvraj reach out and he does so and gets a nice fat edge

loud shout for a catch behind  It was a length delivery rushing outside off stump, Yuvraj has a lame poke and there is a some sound and the Sri Lankans go up immediately .. not given out by Doctrove though. Mahela, Sanga, Malinga n co can't believe it ..
beaten outside off ... Malinga is making Yuvraj reach out outside off
pushes it too wide outside off and Sanga can't cut it off cleanly
again retains the strike with a push to mid-off
around the off stump, driven to long-off for a single
goes right back to clip it to deep square-leg
on the middle and off, skidding in, worked to the on side for a single
slower, just outside off, cut to backward point
gets on the back foot to punch it down to long-on
comes in with the arm, from round the stumps, defended to covers
short in length, on the middle, Dravid allows it to come to him before whipping it to deep square-leg region
short in length, just around the off stump, around 142 kmph, pushed towards the non-striker
143.6 just short of the yorker length, Dravid falls over a bit as he tries to whip it away ,,, and is struck on the pad .. that ball tailed in real late
142.7 kmph short in length and outside off, run down to third man
well outside the off stump, Yuvraj chases it and punches it to sweeper cover
nasty little bouncer on the right shoulder of Dravid who drops his wrists and sways away at the last minute..
around the off stump, pushed down to long-on
on the off stump line, gets forward to push it to the off side
leans forward to swing the flighted delivery to wide midwicket boundary.
That's maximum,. Huge one over long-on. He stretched forward to pick the ball from outside off and heaved it over long-on boundary.
quicker and flatter, flicked away for a single.. India now are on 101 for 2
stays back to punch it to sweeper cover
145. 8 kmph fullish delivery on the middle stump line, Yuvraj was hanging on the back foot and manages to get bat on ball and squeezes it past square-leg
142.2 length delivery well outside off, run down to third man
full again, just outside off stump, steered to backward point
138.6 kmph well outside off, Yuvraj doesn't move his feet, just lunges across but can't get bat on ball ...
the slow bouncer but it's too high though and climbs well over Yuvraj Singh
144.4 kmph slinging delivery outside off, Yuvraj is again caught at the crease, has a lame poke at it and is beaten again

Yuvraj's struggles against Malinga ends. Another one a touch wide outside off, Yuvraj was again caught at the crease, feet going no where, and stabs it to a delighted Sanga. Perfect plan this. Throughout Yuvraj's stay, Malinga has been pushing across well outside off, testing Yuvraj's foot work and it has paid off. It was almost inevitable. Yuvraj was beaten quite a few times, there was a loud shout for a catch behind and he is finally gone now
on the off stump line, dabbed to midwicket
slower one , short and well outside off stump, cut down to right of Malinga at sweeper cover
short in length around the off stump, punched to Malinga
Raina is out for a golden duck. It was a slow off cutter, pushed across Raina who tried to run it down to third man but got a thick edge and Sanga flew to his left to take a lovely catch.
ooh ,.... Dhoni walks down the track and tries to punch a short-of-length delivery through the off side and is beaten
moves in towards off stump, jabbed away to cover
142.6 kmph just short of the yorker length, tailing in towards leg and middle, Dravid waits, takes care not the get his front foot in the way and flicks it to the fine-leg boundary
drops this short of length delivery close on the off side and calls Dhoni for a quick single
fullish, on the middle, tilting in, pushed out to the on side
short in length outside off stump, run down to third man
sharp bouncer but just down the leg side... wide
141.3 kmph length delivery in the corridor, keeps a touch low, Dravid tries to squeeze it down to third man but misses it completely
short in length, bouncing outside off, guided to Dilshan at backward point
Run out of Dravid missed by Dilshan. It was pushed to the off side, after some hesitation they get across and Dravid has actually given up but Dilshan's throw was slightly off target
just outside off stump, guided to Dilshan
stands up tall to punch it to right of sweeper cover
back of length outside off stump, steered to right of Jayasuriya at third man
full, slower one, on the off stump, pushed to the off side and this time they don't even think about the run as Dilshan pounces on the ball
length delivery outside off stump, flashed to left of deep cover
on the middle and off line, defended back down the pitch
stretches forward to drive to long-off

Another run out chance missed goes on the back foot, backs away a touch and forces it to  deep midwicket and again, there is some confusion. Dhoni called Dravid for the second run but stops in the middle of the crease. Dravid turns back and had Jayasuriya collected the throw, he would have been a goner. Dravid goes across to have a chat with Dhoni. It has to be said the throw wasn't too great.. it bounced awkwardly in front of Jayasuriya .. at the end of the over ... Dilshan suggests Jayasuriya should have bent down on his knee and taken the throw and Jaya says something back and both have a laugh. Lovely!
leans forward to defend to the off side
gets on the front foot to defend
short in length, cut away for a single
pushes it away for a single
leans forward to on drive for a single
short and climbing outside off, cut down to sweeper cover

Angelo has cleaned up Dravid! India are tottering here at 126 for 5. It landed full in length outside off stump and cut in, Dravid went for the big off drive but it rushed through the bat and pad gap and kept a touch low to peg back the off stump.
full in length, around the off stump, pushed to the off side
driven to the left of the non striker and Jayasuriya rushes to stop it
leans forward to turn it to the on side for a single
leans forward to defend down the pitch
slightly shortish, mistimes the pull to the on side
low full toss, hit in the air towards the non striker and Jayasuriya dives but can't quite reach it
leans forward to push through the on side
The off stump has taken another beating. Angelooooo!  Another delivery that cut back in a bit, Dhoni tried to force it through the off side and got a fatal inside edge
run out of Harbhajan missed leans forward to push it to covers, fumbled towards mid-off where Kandamby fires in a throw but misses the stumps at the non-striker's end. Harbhajan had given up ..

What a night Angelo is having. It was the slower one outside off, that stopped and bounced at Yusuf who had no answer to it. He just stabbed at it  and got a nick through to . Quite a difficult delivery to contend with. It bounced and stopped and what not ...
leans across to defend to the off side
just outside off stump, punched to sweeper cover
lands on a length, cuts away and RP is beaten on the drive
outside off stump, square driven through point
flighted across around off, driven to cover
googly , Harbhajan picks it late and dabs it to short fine-leg
slightly short, cut away through point
big flash and a miss. Can Angelo get a five-for
slower one outside off, Harbhajan is early into the shot, checks his drive but is still beaten
another slow off cutter, dabbed to the on side
worked through the on side for a single
shout for lbw but Dharmasena signals that there was some bat involved there. It was a length delivery tailing in on the middle and leg, RP tries to work it across the line and edges it to his pad

Five-for for Angelo! Sensational evening for him. Another one cutting back in from outside off, Harbhajan tries to get something on it .. pad .. bat .. some thing but it squeezes past the pad, then the bat and falls on to the stumps!
full delivery, RP swings it, top edges it high in the air but it falls well short of long-on
slower, on the off stump line, defended to cover
leans across to squeeze it towards point for a single
just outside off stump, pushed away on the front foot
googly on the off and middle, swept away to deep square-leg
another googly, gets through the defenses of Nehra and rolls past the leg stump
on a length around the off stump, jabbed away to the on side

Angelo can't stop smiling. And why not. What a night. Another in cutter, another batsman who pushes outside the line of the ball, yet another time the ball goes through the bat and pad and yep, it's that off stump that is taking some bruising tonight. The crowd roar.
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
aha! almost another wicket. It was that nip backer again, Ishant got a thick inside edge that took the ball past the leg stump and down to fine-leg boundary
leans forward to stab this one to the off side
short in length outside off stump, guided to Dilshan at backward point
full on the middle and off, driven to long-on
whips it to wide long-on region for couple of runs
lands on a length, breaks away and Ishant is beaten on the drive
keeps low on the off stump line, pushed away to the off side
long and long off come in side the circle and Ishant is beaten by the delivery that cuts away
floated full outside off, driven to mid-off
full delivery on the off, edged to backward square-leg
full delivery outside off, squeezed to backward point
full again, slower one outside off, nudged to backward point
141.1 short of the yorker length outside off, dug out to the off side
slings in a yorker on the middle and leg line, stabbed off the inner edge to backward square-leg
full pitched outside off, pushed to the off side
With mid-on and mid-off in, Ishant charges down the track and lifts Mendis over mid-off
gets forward to defend to the off side
moves down the track and drags the intended heave wide of mid-on for a single
on the off stump line, swung away to deep midwicket
googly but goes down the leg side ...
carrom ball cutting away outside off stump past the outside edge
on the middle, jabbed to cover
short in length on the middle, turned to midwicket
yorker length just outside leg, squeezed to backward square-leg
stays back,  digs this fullish delivery to the on side
stands up tall to defend a short-of-length delivery
banged in short but it slips down the leg side
ooh a sharp bouncer on the off and middle, Ishant does well to drop his wrists, get the bat out of the way as he sways away
the slow yorker this time, well kept out by Ishant who smiles at Malinga who returns the sentiment
floated full around off , lifted over mid-on and it runs away to the boundary. RP shares a laugh with Ishant
leans forward to defend to the off side
goes right back to defend
googly, breaks back in, RP doesn't pick it. was shaping to cut and it bounds off the mid-riff to Mahela at first slip
leans forward to defend to the on side
another googly, goes for the big swing and edges it to deep square-leg
low full toss, pushed back to the bowler
pushed across Ishant who tries to cut but doesn't connect
full and outside off stump, square driven to Jayasuriya standing at wide third man
full delivery has been smashed past the non-striker!
length delivery in the zone outside off, RP is beaten, pushing inside the line
on the middle stump line, pushed out to the off side. These two resisting rather valiantly. Chris Martin, the Phantom, wouldn't have approved.
googly outside off stump, defended on the front foot

Sri Lanka complete a thumping win.  Ishant has holed out to long-on. A fine innings from Jayasuriya and a gem of a knock from Kandamby charged Sri Lanka to a daunting total before Angelo derailed the chase with a six-for. What a crushing win. What a wonderful game for the hosts; the visitors have lot to think about before the final.
